import { Meta, Story, Canvas, ArgsTable } from '@storybook/addon-docs';

import { iconNames } from '@equinor/fusion-wc-icon';

import Avatar, { AvatarWrapper } from './Components/Avatar';

export const Container = ({ title, children }) => (
  <section>
    <h4>{title}</h4>
    <div style={{ display: 'flex', gap: '10px' }}>{children}</div>
  </section>
);

export const Template = (props) => (
  <div>
    <Container title="Photo">
      <fwc-avatar
        src="https://i.imgur.com/GcZeeXX.jpeg"

      />

        src="https://i.imgur.com/GcZeeXX.jpeg"

        size="large"

      />

      <fwc-avatar presence="BeRightBack" initial="A" {...props} />
      <fwc-avatar presence="Busy" initial="A" {...props} />
      <fwc-avatar presence="BusyIdle" initial="A" {...props} />
      <fwc-avatar presence="DoNotDisturb" initial="A" {...props} />
      <fwc-avatar presence="Offline" initial="A" {...props} />
      <fwc-avatar presence="PresenceUnknown" initial="A" {...props} />

      <fwc-avatar presence="Available" initial="A" position="Employee" {...props} />

      />

  </div>
);
